mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REP_NO, mem_ID, REP_CODE, REP_BCODE, REP_BNO, REP_REID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(REP_NO),0) + 1 FROM REPORT),#{id},#{code},#{bcode},#{bno}, #{repid})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM REPORT WHERE REP_isDeleted = 'N'

SELECT r.REP_no AS no, r.MEM_id AS id, r.REP_code AS code, r.REP_bcode AS bcode, r.REP_bno AS bno, r.REP_reid AS repid, r.REP_cDate AS wdate, m.MEM_block AS block FROM REPORT r, MEMBER m WHERE r.REP_isDeleted= 'N' AND m.Mem_id = r.Mem_id AND R.REP_ISDELETED = 'N' ORDER BY r.REP_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET mem_block = 'F' WHERE mem_id= #{repid}
UPDATE REPORT SET REP_isDeleted = 'Y' WHERE REP_no= #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT REP_REID AS REPID FROM REPORT WHERE REP_NO =#{no}
